final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Pharmacy
        subgraph Technician
            A([Every hour]) --> B[Enter prescription details]
        end
        subgraph Pharmacist
            G[Check quality] --> I{X}
            I -->|Not ok| F[Perform thorough check]
            I -->|Ok| J[Collect payment]
        end
    end
    subgraph Pharmacy system
        B --> C[Perform DUR]
        C --> D{X}
        D -->|Alarms| E[Check insurance]
        D -->|No alarms| H[Collect drugs from shelves]
        E --> H
        H --> G
        J --> K([Prescription fulfilled])
    end
